  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character(Integer cost, String image, Boolean hasIncreasedCost, HashSet<Integer> students, Integer noEntryNumber)
      Custom builder for the view. Omits Variables not useful for user interaction.
      Parameters:
      cost - cost of the character
      image - image to show
      hasIncreasedCost - flag to display a coin on top of the character
      students - students contained, may be empty
      noEntryNumber - no entry pieces contained, may be 0

    • Character

      public Character()
      Constructor used by JSON parsing of the character

  • Method Details

    • effect

      public void effect(PlayCharacterRequest req)
      Depending on the character type, calls the relative effect (move/exchange/add/resolve)
      Parameters:
